alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 7:26PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Collier, northern Mainland Monroe, northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 725 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Dade-Collier Training Airport, or 28 miles east of Chokoloskee, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dade-Collier Training Airport and Big Cypress National Preserve. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
